description:
Warzone 2100, released in 1999 and developed by Pumpkin Studios, was a ground-breaking and innovative 3D real-time strategy game.

3D Open Source Real-Time Strategy Game Command the forces of The Project in a battle to rebuild the world after mankind has been nearly destroyed by nuclear missiles.
Offers an extensive single-player campaign, cross-platform multiplayer, local skirmish with AI bots.
